about.title: About me
description: Hey there, I’m Nathalie — a Fullstack Developer and nature lover, passionate about coding because it combines logical thinking with creativity.

My main source of inspiration is the continuous learning process that comes with real-world challenges. Each bug, feature, or refactor is an opportunity to better understand how things work and how they can be improved. I actively look for efficient and maintainable solutions, learning from feedback, documentation, and experimentation.
I value clean code, clear communication, and collaboration, and I approach challenges with curiosity and persistence.

skills.title: Skill set
skills.description: I’ve worked on front-end and fullstack projects, applying modern technologies to create functional, maintainable solutions. I enjoy learning new tools and approaches, continuously expanding my skills to tackle new challenges.
skills.bottomSticker: I also want to dive into:

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Explore my projects to see how I turn ideas into responsive, user-friendly web applications designed to solve real-world problems.

nico.text: During the team project, Nathalie impressed with her reliability, helpfulness and active contribution to team development. Even beyond direct collaboration, interacting with her proves to be consistently positive and inspiring.

wladi.text: I had the pleasure of working with an extremely calm and pleasant person who always approached complex issues with foresight and clarity. Nathalie's professional expertise and understanding of the big picture noticeably enriched our project.

contact.title: Ready to work together?
description: As a Fullstack Developer, I can support projects by collaborating on features, improving functionality and adapting to existing workflows and technologies.
With a strong foundation in modern web development and a problem-solving mindset, I contribute through clear communication and ownership of my tasks.
If you’re looking for a motivated developer ready to contribute and add value to your project, I’d be happy to connect.

policy.suffix: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

contact.success: Thank you! The message has been sent successfully and I will get back to you as soon as possible.

join.cardDescription: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Features tasks, subtasks, user assignment and due dates. Developed with Vanilla JavaScript and Firebase in a Scrum-based group project to practice agile teamwork and project management.
join.detailDescription: JOIN is a web application developed as part of a Scrum-based group project to gain practical experience in agile teamwork and project management. It is a task manager inspired by the Kanban System that features tasks, subtasks, user assignment and due dates.
implementation: My main responsibilities included implementing the Kanban board feature, building the core UI structure with page navigation, and developing the login and sign-up client-side validation and user feedback.

We organized our workflow through clear task distribution and regular coordination. This allowed me to work independently on assigned features while ensuring seamless integration into the overall application concept.

nara.cardDescription: Browser-based game built with Vanilla JavaScript to practice object-oriented programming (OOP), in which you use your bow and courage to protect the Greenwood from the rising darkness.
nara.detailDescription: This game was created to practice OOP (object oriented programming). The goal was to provide a fun and interactive experience directly in the browser, without any external frameworks.
implementation: My main responsibilities included implementing the Kanban board feature, building the core UI structure with page navigation, and developing the login and sign-up client-side validation and user feedback.

We organized our workflow through clear task distribution and regular coordination. This allowed me to work independently on assigned features while ensuring seamless integration into the overall application concept.

leseoase.cardDescription: A full-stack web app for book enthusiasts to manage and organize their reading journey. Built with React, Node.js, Express.js and MongoDB.
leseoase.detailDescription: A user-friendly Book Tracking App designed for book enthusiasts to manage and organize their reading journey. The currently implemented features include searching for books by title, author, or ISBN, categorizing books into Reading, Read, and TBR lists, tracking reading progress by logging the current page, and managing the user profile.
implementation: During this project, I independently planned and developed a full-stack web application, focusing on the overall user flow and UI structure.

I implemented core features using React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, integrated the Google Books API, and built secure account management features such as password reset and form validation. I also ensured the application is fully responsive across devices.
The project strengthened my skills in full-stack development, API integration, and creating user-focused applications from concept to deployment.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.content: This website is operated by Nathalie Giancaspro. The purpose of this website is to showcase my projects and provide contact information. Protecting your personal data is important to me. This website is designed to collect as little data as possible.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: No personal data is collected automatically when visiting this website. If you contact me via the contact form, the information you provide (such as name, email address, and message) will be used solely to respond to your inquiry. This data will not be shared with third parties and will be deleted after the communication has ended, unless legal retention obligations apply.

tracking.title: Cookies and Tracking
tracking.content: This website does not use cookies, tracking tools, analytics services, or advertising technologies.

localStorage.title: Local Storage
localStorage.content: To improve usability, this website uses browser local storage to save the language selected by the user to display the website in the preferred language. The data remains stored until it is deleted by the user via their browser settings. The stored information is not transmitted to third parties.

externalServices.title: External Services
externalServices.content: This website contains links to external websites or social media profiles. When visiting these external websites, personal data may be processed by their respective operators. I have no control over how these third parties process your data. Please refer to the privacy policies of the respective external websites for more information.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to request information about the personal data stored about you, as well as the right to correction or deletion of such data. If you have any questions regarding data protection, you can contact me at:

encryption.title: SSL or TLS Encryption
encryption.content: This website uses SSL or TLS encryption for security reasons and to protect the transmission of confidential content, such as inquiries sent via the contact form. An encrypted connection can be recognized by the change from “http://” to “https://” in the browser’s address bar and by the lock icon displayed in the browser.

final.title: Final Clause
final.content: This privacy policy may be updated or amended at any time to reflect legal or technical changes.
